channel.title: Openssl on GM游戏网
channel.description: Recent content in Openssl on GM游戏网

item.title: Encrypt string using Openssl
item.description: Try this: echo 'foo' | openssl aes-256-cbc -pbkdf2 -a -salt echo 'U2FsdGVkX1/QGdl4syQE8bLFSr2HzoAlcG299U/T/Xk=' | openssl aes-256-cbc -pbkdf2 -a -d -salt Run openssl list-cipher-commands to list all available ciphers.
